ExtendedSection.Title: Add detailed help texts for each field

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
Example 5 describes the best practice to add labels and detailed help texts for the form editor, in such a way, that localization of the form editor gets possible.

In the second example, the <resourcebundles> definition inside the <xsd:appinfo> element was dropped. Example 5 adds it again.

The resource types app in example 1 added a basic application message properties file and stored it under /system/modules/org.opencms.examples.content/i18n/org.opencms.examples.content.messages_en.
